body.p:
Newport Ky
Oct. 1. 1863
Govr Bramlette
Frankfort
Dear Sir:
John F. Hildreth Esq of Cincinnati desires the appointment of Commissioner for the State of Kentucky to take the acknowledgement of Deeds, &.

Mr. H. is a young gentleman studying law and is perfectly competent for this position. He is truly loyal and his appointment will be a dedication to many of our profession & other businness men of this city & the City of Covington
Hoping that you will appoint Mr. H. to the position I have sir the Honor to be

Your Ob Ser.
E. W. Hawkins
F. M. Webster Attoy
James R CHallen
Atty Cincinnati
Jos Doniphan
Judge 9th Judicial
District of Ky
R B Carpenter
Cmths Atty

Direct - John F Hildreth
Cincti Ohio
care of James R. Challen Atty the fee will be foward to the Sec; if appointed yours Respectfully

J. F. Hildreth
Ohio
Comr Deed
